com.xerox.xrce.codex.jri.model.tracker
Class CxArtifactFieldSet

java.lang.Object
  com.xerox.xrce.codex.jri.model.CxFromServer
      com.xerox.xrce.codex.jri.model.tracker.CxArtifactFieldSet

public class CxArtifactFieldSet
extends CxFromServer

CxArtifactFieldSet is the class for field set. A FieldSet is a logical set of fields.
